title: The Reluctant Vampire
description: A young woman stumbles out of a bar onto the street curb after throwing up and passing out. She is 'saved' by someone, a vampire that has been watching her, wanting her for his own. He decides making her a vampire would give him a great companion but she is turned into a vampire against her will once she realizes it. She is constantly haunted by her maker throughout her ordeals as she fights against her very being at first. She meets a fellow vampire who shows her how fun being a vampire can really be by dropping out of classes and traveling the world with him seeing things people have only dreamed of under the dark of night. Again, her maker continues to haunt her and plague her mind. She goes on her own for awhile, leaving her male friend behind and meets a new female friend who teaches her a lot. She begins to learn her place in her horror of a world. Finally, she finds true love, but he is mortal and she is a vampire. Will it ever work? Will their love endure? Find out what happens in this spellbinding book of good, bad, the ugly and true love.
author: Jodie Pierce
